Class SubprocessBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.SubprocessBuilder

  • public class SubprocessBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder class that starts a subprocess.

        public SubprocessBuilder setEnv(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> env)
        Sets the environment passed to the child process. If null, inherit the environment of the server.

      • getStdout

        public SubprocessBuilder.StreamAction getStdout()

      • getStdoutFile

        public java.io.File getStdoutFile()

      • setStdout

        public SubprocessBuilder setStdout(SubprocessBuilder.StreamAction action)
        Tells the object what to do with stdout: either stream as a InputStream or discard.

        It can also be redirected to a file using setStdout(File).

      • setStdout

        public SubprocessBuilder setStdout(java.io.File file)
        Sets the file stdout is appended to. If null, the stdout will be available as an input stream on the resulting object representing the process.

      • setTimeoutMillis

        public SubprocessBuilder setTimeoutMillis(long timeoutMillis)

      • getTimeoutMillis

        public long getTimeoutMillis()

      • getStderr

      • getStderrFile

        public java.io.File getStderrFile()

      • setStderr

        public SubprocessBuilder setStderr(SubprocessBuilder.StreamAction action)
        Tells the object what to do with stderr: either stream as a InputStream or discard.

        It can also be redirected to a file using setStderr(File).

      • setStderr

        public SubprocessBuilder setStderr(java.io.File file)
        Sets the file stderr is appended to. If null, the stderr will be available as an input stream on the resulting object representing the process.

      • getWorkingDirectory

        public java.io.File getWorkingDirectory()

      • setWorkingDirectory

        public SubprocessBuilder setWorkingDirectory(java.io.File workingDirectory)
        Sets the current working directory. If null, it will be that of this process.

                 throws java.io.IOException
